```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(janitor)
library(here)

```

```{r}
# read in data

ces <- read_csv(here("data", "ces3demographics.csv")) %>% 
  clean_names()
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = ces, aes(x = white_percent, y = ces_3_0_score)) +
  geom_hex() + scale_fill_gradient(low = "red", high = "yellow")
  labs(x = "White population percentage", y = "CalEnviroSrcreen pollution burden score") +
  theme_minimal()
```
